content: you are crocheting the reduced version of the pattern you are jumping here after doing an all-double_crochet row as your 47th row be careful because in this case the stitch count does not match as you missed all the seaweed row but the stitches should be proportional less repetitions of the * part 15 54th row chain 4 counts as 1st treble_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into 1st st skip 2 st 1 single_crochet *skip 2 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into the next st skip 2 st 1 single_crochet* repeat from * until the last st 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet middle 1 single_crochet *skip 2 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into the next st skip 2 st 1 single_crochet* repeat from * until the 4th last st skip 2 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 1 treble_crochet into last st stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 216 double_crochet + 36 single_crochet + 72 chain per side + 2 chain in the middle 55th row 1 chain 1 single_crochet into 1st st 3 chain *1 single_crochet between the two middle double_crochet below 3 chain 1 double_crochet 1 chain 1 double_crochet into the single_crochet below 3 chain* repeat from * until the last single_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 chain 1 double_crochet into the middle ch2-space *3 chain 1 double_crochet 1 chain 1 double_crochet into the single_crochet below 3 chain 1 single_crochet between the two middle double_crochet below* repeat from * until the last shell 3 chain single_crochet into last st stitch count 255 chain + 37 single_crochet + 72 double_crochet per side + 2 double_crochet 1 chain in the middle 56th row chain 4 counts as 1st treble_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into 1st st skip 3 chain *1 single_crochet into single_crochet below skip 3 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into the next chain-space skip 3 chain* repeat from * until the last chain-space 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into the middle chain-space skip 3 chain * 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into the next chain-space skip 3 chain 1 single_crochet into single_crochet below skip 3 chain* repeat from * until the second last single_crochet 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet 1 chain 1 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet into last st stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 221 double_crochet + 36 single_crochet + 74 chain per side + 6 double_crochet 2 chain in the middle 16 print-friendly version base triangle initial ring/loop chain 4 join with slip_stitch on the 1st chain to make a loop 4 chain in a closed loop 1st row all stitches go into the initial ring/loop 4 chain counts as 1st treble_crochet 5 double_crochet ch2 middle 5 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 5 double_crochet per side + 2 chain in the middle 2nd row chain
